sentences.sContent: His behavior alienated him and his brother.
sentences.sContent_eng: His behavior alienated him and his brother.
sentences.sCn: 他的行为使他跟哥哥疏远了。

sentences.sContent: Her increasing belligerence alienated her from her old friends.
sentences.sContent_eng: Her increasing belligerence alienated her from her old friends.
sentences.sCn: 她的日益增长的好战性使她和她的老朋友们疏远了。

remMethod.val: alien(外国的) + ate → 把别人当外国人 → 使疏远

words.tran: 异化；疏远；转让；[内科] 精神错乱；间离效果（alienation effect）
